title.value: Thresholds of Agropyron repens harmfulness in corn crops cultivated for grain and green mass
Пороги вредоносности пырея ползучего в посевах кукурузы, выращиваемой на зерно и зеленую массу

person.name: Kolesnik, S.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied thresholds of couch grass (Agropyron repens) harmfulness in maize (Zea mays) crops cultivated for grain and green mass to justify the need for special protective measures. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2011-2012 (Priluki, Minsk region) on a trial field of the Institute of Plant Protection in maize crops on sod-podzolic light loamy soil. As a result of realized research it was determined the biological threshold of Agropyron repens harmfulness in maize crops at which the chemical protective measures were necessary to be carried out. Under conditions of the year close to mean perennial hydrothermal indicators it made 24 stems/m2 for green mass cultivation and 16.0 – for grain, in the moist year conditions – 15.0 and 16.0 stems/m2, accordingly. Dependence of the yield of maize green mass and maize grain productivity on the degree of infestation by couch grass, couch grass harmfulness in maize crops, cultivated on green mass, couch grass harmfulness in maize crops, cultivated on grain were presented.
